text: The 1988 Big Eight Men's Basketball Tournament was held March 10–12 at Kemper Arena in Kansas City, Missouri. Top-seeded Oklahoma defeated #2 seed Kansas State in the championship game, 88–83, to earn the conference's automatic bid to the 1988 NCAA Tournament. ==Bracket== ==References== Tournament Category:Big Eight Conference Men's Basketball Tournament Big Eight Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
title: 1988 Big Eight Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
